modules.description: This module treats a filesystem device as a read-only key-value store, enabling operations like checking key existence, retrieving values, listing directory entries, and fetching metadata such as last modified time and value digests. It works with keys represented as hierarchical paths and supports both file-like values and directory-like dictionaries. Concrete use cases include serving static assets from a filesystem or exposing read-only configuration data in networked applications.

This module defines common error types and metadata structures for interacting with filesystem devices. It supports operations like reading files, listing directory contents, and checking file metadata, working with paths and hierarchical directory structures. Concrete use cases include serving static files from a read-only filesystem or exposing configuration data in networked applications.
